::Zardus::

Zardus listens with interest, noting Lady Hawk's reluctance to answer.

"From what I've seen," Zardus says when she finally finishes, "You're 
a good scientist. If I had one like that on my crew I wouldn't just 
leave."

He pauses, his mind working on what she had said about DNA. On his 
group... From what he had understood before, Lady Hawk was trying to 
make a new type of bot with DNA from animals. He hadn't been aware 
that she was also to experiment on the DNA from the Alliance.

"This group of scientists, are they after DNA like you? This planet 
is the only planet in the solar system with such lifeforms. If they 
were after DNA, they would certainly stay here instead of simply 
leaving."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk reluctantly answered the question but avoided as many of 
the facts
> as she could. "I arrived with a group of scientists. I was sent 
here to
> study and experiment on the DNA of your group. you were pretty much 
in the
> center of the commotion so this seemed the proper spot to begin." 
she knew
> he wanted more than she could give without revealing information 
about her
> father and Foxfingers. "I was dropped off while the others searched 
the
> other planets in this galaxy. I was due back weeks ago, They've 
probably
> abandoned me by now." she hoped that Zardus wouldn't think about the
> heritage she'd already revealed, She was a princess, royalty 
wouldn't be
> abandoned without proof of trouble.
